wenath web adawi thulin dawunlod kirima etharam aarakshakari deyak nowiya haka.esema mudal di miladi ganne nam eewa antharjalaya thulin liyapadinchi kirimatath waga bala ganna.anek wadagath karuna thamayi me wayiras gad nitharama yawathkalina kirima nathnam apdet kirima.api kopamana prabhala wayiras gad ekak sthapitha kalath eya nisi paridi apdet karanne nathinam eyata wayiras handuna ganima ha eewa kriyathmaka wima walakwima saha iwath kirima kala nohaki we.ee nisa oba pawichchi karana wayiras gad eka nitharama apdet thathwaye thiya ganna uthsaha karanna.boho wayiras gad antharjalaya samaga sambandha wu sanin ibema yawathkalina wana athara obata antharjala pahasukam hama witama nathinam aduma tharame sathiyakata warakwath antharjalaya ha sambandha wi apdet kirima ho apdet fayil eka wenamama dawunlod kara instol kirima wadagathwe.

dambaadiwa bauddha, hindu sama denama wishwasa karanne anagarika dharmapalathuma nositinnata dambaadiwa siddhasthana bauddhayanta ahimiwana bawayi. 1920 di anagarika dharmapalathuma brithanya palakayan wisin niwasa adassiye wasara hathak sirakara thabu awasthawe godanangana lada indiyanu mahabodhi samagame mulasthanaya wu shri dharmarajika ෙchthiya wiharaya ada loka urumayak hatiyata nam kara atha.
